item.title: [sld] Doomsday
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

item.title: [sld] Thoughtseize
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

item.title: [sld] Carrion Feeder
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Carrion Feeder can't block.

Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.

item.title: [sld] Plaguecrafter
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

When Plaguecrafter enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each player who can't discards a card.

item.title: [sld] Doomsday
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library and graveyard for five cards and exile the rest. Put the chosen cards on top of your library in any order. You lose half your life, rounded up.

item.title: [sld] Thoughtseize
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

item.title: [sld] Imprisoned in the Moon
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature, land, or planeswalker

Enchanted permanent is a colorless land with "{T}: Add {C}" and loses all other card types and abilities.

item.title: [sld] Stasis
item.description:
Enchantment

Players skip their untap steps.

At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Stasis unless you pay {U}.

item.title: [sld] Wheel of Sun and Moon
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant player

If a card would be put into enchanted player's graveyard from anywhere, instead that card is revealed and put on the bottom of that player's library.

item.title: [sld] Prismatic Omen
item.description:
Enchantment

Lands you control are every basic land type in addition to their other types.

item.title: [sld] Laboratory Maniac
item.description:
Creature — Human Wizard

If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.

item.title: [sld] Stitcher's Supplier
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

When Stitcher's Supplier enters the battlefield or dies, mill three cards.

item.title: [sld] Beast Whisperer
item.description:
Creature — Elf Druid

Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

item.title: [sld] Wood Elves
item.description:
Creature — Elf Scout

When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Vizier of the Menagerie
item.description:
Creature — Naga Cleric

You may look at the top card of your library any time.

You may cast creature spells from the top of your library.

You may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast creature spells.

item.title: [sld] Phyrexian Metamorph
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Shapeshifter

({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)

You may have Phyrexian Metamorph enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact or creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

item.title: [sld] Tezzeret the Seeker
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Tezzeret

+1: Untap up to two target artifacts.

−X: Search your library for an artifact card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

−5: Artifacts you control become artifact creatures with base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Phyrexian Metamorph
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Shapeshifter

({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)

You may have Phyrexian Metamorph enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact or creature on the battlefield, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

item.title: [sld] Skullclamp
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/-1.

Whenever equipped creature dies, draw two cards.

Equip {1}

item.title: [sld] Solemn Simulacrum
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

item.title: [sld] Tezzeret the Seeker
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Tezzeret

+1: Untap up to two target artifacts.

−X: Search your library for an artifact card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

−5: Artifacts you control become artifact creatures with base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn.

item.title: [sld] Skullclamp
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/-1.

Whenever equipped creature dies, draw two cards.

Equip {1}

item.title: [sld] Solemn Simulacrum
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

item.title: [sld] Ash Barrens
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

Basic landcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

item.title: [sld] Command Beacon
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}, Sacrifice Command Beacon: Put your commander into your hand from the command zone.

item.title: [sld] Strip Mine
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}, Sacrifice Strip Mine: Destroy target land.

item.title: [sld] Fabled Passage
item.description:
Land

{T}, Sacrifice Fabled Passage: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Then if you control four or more lands, untap that land.

item.title: [pres] Valkyrie Harbinger
item.description:
Creature — Angel Cleric

Flying, lifelink

At the beginning of each end step, if you gained 4 or more life this turn, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying and vigilance.

item.title: [pres] Cyclone Summoner
item.description:
Creature — Giant Wizard

When Cyclone Summoner enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, return all permanents to their owners' hands except for Giants, Wizards, and lands.

item.title: [gn3] Ancestral Blade
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

When Ancestral Blade enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token, then attach Ancestral Blade to it.

Equipped creature gets +1/+1.

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [gn3] Danitha Capashen, Paragon
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Knight

First strike, vigilance, lifelink

Aura and Equipment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

item.title: [gn3] Captain of the Watch
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

Other Soldier creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

When Captain of the Watch enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

item.title: [gn3] Banisher Priest
item.description:
Creature — Human Cleric

When Banisher Priest enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Banisher Priest leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

item.title: [gn3] Kor Duelist
item.description:
Creature — Kor Soldier

As long as Kor Duelist is equipped, it has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

item.title: [gn3] Kitesail Apprentice
item.description:
Creature — Kor Soldier

As long as Kitesail Apprentice is equipped, it gets +1/+1 and has flying.

item.title: [gn3] Heavenly Blademaster
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying, double strike

When Heavenly Blademaster enters the battlefield, you may attach any number of Auras and Equipment you control to it.

Other creatures you control get +1/+1 for each Aura and Equipment attached to Heavenly Blademaster.

item.title: [gn3] Forbidding Spirit
item.description:
Creature — Spirit Cleric

When Forbidding Spirit enters the battlefield, until your next turn, creatures can't attack you or planeswalkers you control unless their controller pays {2} for each of those creatures.

item.title: [gn3] Serra Angel
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying, vigilance

item.title: [gn3] Pilgrim of the Ages
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

When Pilgrim of the Ages enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

{6}: Return Pilgrim of the Ages from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [gn3] Path to Exile
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [gn3] Kor Outfitter
item.description:
Creature — Kor Soldier

When Kor Outfitter enters the battlefield, you may attach target Equipment you control to target creature you control.

item.title: [gn3] Swords to Plowshares
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

item.title: [gn3] Strength of Arms
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you control an Equipment, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.

item.title: [gn3] Vow of Duty
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has vigilance, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.

item.title: [gn3] Valorous Stance
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

• Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.

item.title: [gn3] Angler Drake
item.description:
Creature — Drake

Flying

When Angler Drake enters the battlefield, you may return target creature to its owner's hand.

item.title: [gn3] Angler Turtle
item.description:
Creature — Turtle

Hexproof

Creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able.

item.title: [gn3] Brineborn Cutthroat
item.description:
Creature — Merfolk Pirate

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

Whenever you cast a spell during an opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Brineborn Cutthroat.

item.title: [gn3] Fact or Fiction
item.description:
Instant

Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

item.title: [gn3] Diluvian Primordial
item.description:
Creature — Avatar

Flying

When Diluvian Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may cast up to one target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If a spell cast this way would be put into a graveyard, exile it instead.
